content: {"locationId": "11186", "organizationId": "8722", "name": "HARVEY'S CHAPEL BAPT CHURCH", "address1": "2515 Mountain Pine Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Hot Spring", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "71913", "country": null, "phone": "501-767-5541", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.562329", "longitude": "-93.154917", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "We are here to prioritize the assistance of those in the Mountain Pine Community. We have set up boundaries for our distribution. They are as follows; if you Live within these areas described, you are welcomed to receive food and clothing at our Food Pantry/Clothes Closet on Wednesdays from 9:00am to 11:15 am. Here is the area we serve: HWY 270: BULL BAYOU THRU ROYAL. HWY 227 TO HWY 192.  HWY 192 & HWY7:NORTH THRU JESSIEVILLE,AR.  HWY 298 TO STORY,AR.  PLEASE BE NOTIFIED THAT HARVEY'S CHAPEL DOES NOT PROVIDE ASSISTANCE WOTH UTILITY BILLS, HOUSE PAYMENTS OR GASOLINE.  HCBC ONLY PROVIDES ASSITANCE WITH FOOD AND CLOTHING TO HELP OFF-SET THE COST OF HOUSEHOLD EXPENSES.", "notes": "As you arrive through our office entrance, please have an identification source with you. A drivers license or mail envelopes with your name and address, so we can register you in our system. ", "contactName": "Irene Heller", "contactPhone": "501-767-5541", "contactEmail": "harveyschapel@yahoo.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 72, "regionName": "Arkansas Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1c4a6bd3-8e23-4c7c-b75a-6bd6f5204146.png", "website": "https://arkansasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Wednesday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
